body:
Next Week after this Sunday and it's off to Tasmania T_T. When I have Assessments...High School Y U DO DIS? Either way my parents said I could stay Home for a week but...most likely they'll force me since they already paid for me to go. :/

Um also when I get back I'd like a reply from my appeal thanks. I've never been or while do a stupid act like that when I've been on this server for almost 1 or 2 years.

Hope everyone has fun on this server.  \(. _.)/
